author: Marian Moisi
description: Marian’s inspiration: “A Secret was born from the desire to create a true legacy drink. Because a true legacy is not only what you leave for the people, but also what you leave in them, every ingredient from the cocktail symbolises life secrets that other people taught me. The goal of A Secret is to inspire people to share their life secrets to help others create their own legacy.”
name: A Secret

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
